CustomField.description: Displays provider, pharmacy, or DEC, primarily for compact layouts.
CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(DEC__c)), DEC__r.Name & " (" & DEC__r.DEC__c & ")",
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Provider__r.Account.Pharmacy_ID__c)), " Pharmacy ID: " & Provider__r.Account.Pharmacy_ID__c,
Provider__r.FirstName & " " & Provider__r.LastName & " (" & TEXT(Provider__r.Provider_Type__c) & " " & Provider__r.Provider_Identifier__c & ")"
))
CustomField.label: Provider
